price: 55. Nabii Yuusuf amoytak: masri baaxoh kadnoonih abba yoo ab diggagh anu yol teceem dacrisaah amaanat leeh tu elle abannih ixxiga le num kinniyok kaak iyye.
arabic: قَالَ ٱجۡعَلۡنِي عَلَىٰ خَزَآئِنِ ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ إِنِّي حَفِيظٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla ij'ʿalnī ʿalā khazāini al-arḍi innī ḥafīẓun ʿalīmun
